name: spark-esports
description: 1. Find out what the current docker image is on the Kubernetes cluster:

scripts.build: npm run build --prefix=front-end && npm run build --prefix=back-end
scripts.release:only:dev: gcloud config set project spark-esport && gcloud app deploy back-end/qa-app.yaml --quiet
scripts.release:only:prod: gcloud config set project spark-esport-prod && gcloud app deploy back-end/prod-app.yaml --quiet
scripts.release:dev: npm run build && npm run build:copy && npm run release:only:dev
scripts.release:prod: npm run build && npm run build:copy && npm run release:only:prod
